title: "Script" type for a logo
content:
Hi there! I'm working on a logo, and my client wants a type like this one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hipopotamo_tipo_6045.jpg)
  
Actually I don't like it too much, so I was wondering If you know what type is this or maybe you can recomend to me another one like this that works better.  
Thank you so much!  
mar
author: marbv

comments.content: [Mishka](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka) Italic by Fentotype Emil Bertell using some swash alternates (/ [n](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/559940/415), / [a](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/559940/209) and / [t](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/italic/glyphs.html#glyphs/559940/520))
